news_header: German Chancellor Olaf Scholz is set to co-chair the 7th Intergovernmental Consultations with Indian Prime Minister Narendra Modi in New Delhi, aiming to elevate Indo-German relations following Germany's recent 'Focus on India' policy.
news_text: Chancellor Olaf Scholz will arrive in New Delhi to co-chair the 7th Intergovernmental Consultations (IGC) with Prime Minister Narendra Modi. This year's IGC is expected to mark a new phase in Indo-German relations, coinciding with Germany's recent 'Focus on India' policy. The consultations will cover enhanced security, talent mobility, economic cooperation, and sustainable development. The event also aligns with the Asia Pacific Conference of German Business, featuring prominent business leaders. Observers note that geopolitical shifts, particularly due to the Ukraine war, may signify a turning point in these ties, termed 'Zeitenwende'.
